metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17440 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GNU Libextractor 1.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted GIF, IT (Impulse Tracker), NSFE, S3M (Scream Tracker 3), SID, or XM (eXtended Module) file, as demonstrated by the EXTRACTOR_xm_extract_method function in plugins/xm_extractor.c. It was discovered tha Libextractor incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libextractor package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
